sect1.title: Call to getMapInfo
sect1.para: This method returns server configuration, which includes layers, initial states and other plugin-specific configuration. Variables returned by this method are set in server configuration files described in .

sect2.title: Global Server Configuration
sect2.para: This includes layers configuration and initial states.

para.programlisting: <complexType name="LayerState"> <all> <element name="id" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="hidden" type="xsd:boolean"/> <element name="frozen" type="xsd:boolean"/> <element name="selected" type="xsd:boolean"/> <element name="unfolded" type="xsd:boolean"/> </all> </complexType>

listitem.para: id - layer state ID
hidden - if true, layer isn't displayed in tree and attribute selected cannot be modified
frozen - if true, layer is displayed in tree but attribute selected cannot be modified
selected - if true, layer is displayed as selected in tree
unfolded - if true, layer tree is displayed unfolded (layer groups)
array - list of layer states
bbox - initial bounding box (see for a description of type Bbox)

para.programlisting: <complexType name="InitialMapState"> <all> <element name="id" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="location" type="types:InitialLocation"/> <element name="layers" type="types:ArrayOfLayerState"/> </all> </complexType>

listitem.para: id - initial state ID
location - initial location
layers - list of layer states
array - list of initial states

para.programlisting: <complexType name="Layer"> <all> <element name="className" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="id" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="label" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="children" type="types:ArrayOfLayerId" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="minScale" type="xsd:double"/> <element name="maxScale" type="xsd:double"/> <element name="icon" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="link" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="aggregate" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="rendering" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="metadata" type="types:ArrayOfString" minOccurs="0"/> </all> </complexType>

listitem.para: className - layer class name: "LayerGroup", "Layer" or "LayerClass"
id - layer ID
label - label to be displayed. This label is not yet translated using internationalization
children - list of children (layer IDs) separated by commas
minScale - minimum scale at which layer will be displayed
maxScale - maximum scale at which layer will be displayed
icon - filename of the static icon for the layer. Dynamic legends are described in
link - if set, layer name is clickable
aggregate - if true, children are not displayed and cannot be selected individually
rendering - how layer will be displayed: "tree", "block", "radio" or "dropdown". See for more details on this option
metadata - list of meta data defined in server configuration file. Format of each string in list is "variable_name=value"
array - list of layers

para.programlisting: <complexType name="MapInfo"> <all> <element name="timestamp" type="xsd:integer"/> <element name="mapLabel" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="keymapGeoDimension" type="types:GeoDimension"/> <element name="notAvailableIcon" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="notAvailablePlusIcon" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="notAvailableMinusIcon" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="layers" type="types:ArrayOfLayer"/> <element name="initialMapStates" type="types:ArrayOfInitialMapState"/> ...elements specific to plugins... </all> </complexType>

listitem.para: timestamp - timestamp of last update. This timestamp is transferred each time method getMap is called, so client knows when configuration was modified (see also )
mapLabel - name of map as defined in mapfile
keymapGeoDimension - pixel and geographical dimension information for key map
notAvailableIcon - filename of icon for not available layer (current scale is above or below this layer maximum/minimum scale)
notAvailablePlusIcon - filename of icon for not available layer (current scale is above this layer maximum scale)
notAvailableMinusIcon - filename of icon for not available layer (current scale is below this layer minimum scale)
layers - list of layers
initialMapStates - list of initial states

sect2.title: Location
sect2.para: This includes configuration specific to Location plugin, ie. fixed scales, scales limits and shortcuts.

listitem.para: label - scale caption
value - scale value to be set when scale is selected
array - list of scales
label - shortcut caption
bbox - bounding box to recenter on when shortcut is selected
array - list of shortcuts

para.programlisting: <complexType name="LocationInit"> <all> <element name="className" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="scales" type="types:ArrayOfLocationScale"/> <element name="minScale" type="xsd:double"/> <element name="maxScale" type="xsd:double"/> <element name="shortcuts" type="types:ArrayOfLocationShortcut"/> </all> </complexType>

listitem.para: className - "LocationInit" or extended class name if project implements an extension
scales - list of fixed scales
minScale - global minimum scale
maxScale - global maximum scale
shortcuts - list of bounding box shortcuts
